addBotChannel.description:
Links a Voice-Channel to a Bot-Channel.
A Bot-Channel creates new Channels to join in.

error.textDescription: Text-Channel selected, the channel must be a Voice-Channel

labels.description: Channel <#$0> configured. Following Channels follow the schema `$1`

removeBotChannel.description: Removes the configuration of a Bot-Channel.

covid19.description: Returns live statistics about the corona pandemic.

labels.loading2: Loading... (Give me a moment for fucks sake)

covid19.error: There was an error retrieving informations about Covid19

cycle.description: Asks the bot, if he wants to play TheCycle!

ehre.description: Awards `Ehre` points to users, that did something honorable.

error.self_remove: You cannot remove `Ehre` from yourself. Stay in there buddy.

loose: I WIN... wait... lets replay that

Imagine what if the answer to all and everything wasn't 42. I mean, we live in a world that is so pure chaos and so deadly and still, here we are, breathing, thinking, loving (well at least you guys). And this on a sphere of dirt that is circling around a gas giant. Every step of this dirt thingi will kill you, almost immediatly. And still you are here. This world could be done in an instant, just a small meteorite (or astroid, forgott how they are called) could end all life. And there could be more life, more living thinking creatures. And what are you doing? Sitting and winning rock paper scissors against a computer. Ridiculus. Great. `[Note from the developer, the bot can't loose]`





I HEARD THAT
tie: There is a theory, that Rock is always winning...
spock: And nop, you can't play this. I win!

help.description: Returns a list of commands, you are able to use or informations about a specific command!

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.

invite.description: Invites a player to join you via a private message.

labels.additional_message: He/she gave me a message to deliver to you: "$0"

success.voice: Hi, $0 has invited you to join him on `$1`. $0 is currently in the channel `$2` online.
success.normal: Hi, $0 has invited you to join him on `$1`.

error.self_invite: You cannot invite your self, duahh 🙈

lang.description: Switches the language of the bot.

error.not_found: Language not found. Here is a list of the available languages:

ping.description: Tests the Ping of the bot.

ban.description: Bans a player with an optional reason.

clear.description: Deletes recent messages from the current channel.

kick.description: Kicks a user from the server with an optional reason.

join.description:
Lets the bot join a voice channel or swap to another channel.
The bot will start playing a title from the queue.
join.error: You must be in a voice channel to summon me!

leave.description: Kicks the bot from the voice channel.
leave.error: I must be in a voice channel to be banished!

queue.description:
Queues a song, lists all songs in a queue or clears a queue.
Songs can be queued by entering the youtube url or a specific search string.
queue.example:
queue list
queue clear
queue listqueues
queue Song_Title
queue https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=video_id

error.added_default: Title `$0` is already in the queue.
error.unknown_error: Unexpected Result while connecting to the Youtube API.
error.usage: No title given! Use `$0$1` to queue a title.

skip.description: Skips to the next song in the queue.

vol.description: Adjusts the volume of the bot

error.title_invalid:
`Title invalid`
Gimme gimme gimme a title. Anything between three and twenty characters
Must match this regex `$0`
error.no_attachment:
`No attachment found`
You're not a Jedi, attachments are not forbidden
error.file_size:
`Filesize exceeds maximum`
Quoting a famous actress: "It's too big 😲"
error.invalid_format:
`File is not in mp3 format`
mp4 and mp5 are forbidden, too
error.already_exists:
`This command already exists`
Try to save it under another command, or overwrite this command using `$0 --overwrite`
error.generic_error:
`Unexpected Error`
Luca expected every possible error. But you ... you managed to find another one

error.title_invalid:
`Title invalid`
Gimme gimme gimme a title. Anything between three and twenty characters

move.description:
Moves all Users in the current voice channel
to the specified voice channel - including you 😉.
Tip: You don't need to write the emoji.

labels.success:
Successfully moved the whole squat to `$0`

These Users are moved:
$1

error.no_channel: You must be connected to a voice channel to use this command.
error.no_move_channel: Could not find any channel like $0

download.description: Downloads a file from youtube and posts it here

error.unknown_download_format: Download format `$0` unknown. See `$1help $2` for allowed formats

download.download_started: Download has started! This may take some time 📡⏳
download.download_completed: Download has finished! Here's your file 💽

error.unknown: This command is unknown. Use `$0help` for a list of commands.
error.generic_error: There was an Error executing the command `$0$1`.
error.general_format:
Your command is not well formated:
`$0<Command> [args] [--<option> [option-arg]]`
error.args_format:
Your arguments are not well formated.
*Hint: Arguments with spaces must be surrounded by one " and cannot contain any additional "*
error.params_format:
Your options are not well formated.
*Hint: Options must start with '--' and __can__ contain one additional argument.*

labels.usage: React with the shown number to execute that command!

labels.disconnecting_emptyChannel: Left channel because nobody was listening :(
